EnExplanation: A conditional form of the verb 'olema,' meaning 'to be,' used to express a hypothetical situation that did not occur.

Samples.EeSentence: Ma ei oleks seal, kui see ei oleks nii tähtis.
Samples.EnSentence: I would not be there if it were not so important.

Samples.EeSentence: Ma arvan, et seal poleks kohta.
Samples.EnSentence: I think there wouldn't be a place there.
